name: Puppy Linux 3.01 Updates
short_description:
Updates to this older version of Puppy Linux  built with Slackware packages.  This older version of Puppy Linux is rock solid on old pentium computers upwards  and through this site using the Fatfree 301 iso which is a barebones iso with applications stripped out.  There is now a pango/GTK update - Please install other updates first including JWM update.

Build up your own system with what you want or update your Puppy 3.01 system.  Pleae note for correct performance when using Seamonkey please install Hicolor-icontheme .pet

There is a new updated patched version of wget please update immediately as of 2/11/2014 here:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/puppylinux301updates/files/Emergency%20Updates/wget-1.16-i486.pet/download
